articles.title: Porsche and Lamborghini get stay of execution on Europe's petrol car ban - Drive
articles.description: Low-volume carmakers will get an extra year to comply with a European ban on engines, while synthetic fuels will become part of the solution.
articles.content: Lamborghini and other manufacturers with new-car registrations of less than 10,000 annually will now have until 2036 to comply with the rules, according to a report by Automotive News Europe, while p… [+107 chars]

articles.title: Apple exec confirms iPhones will switch to USB-C because 'we have no choice' - The Register
articles.description: Sure you have a choice. You could abandon the European market
articles.content:
Apple exec Greg "Joz" Joswiak has confirmed that the company will follow the European Union's requirement for mobile devices to use USB-C by 2024, which was signed into law on Monday.
